#Coring Decisions

DEBUG_Coring_Decisions = {

DEBUG_Core_Whole_World = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats

		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 0
		modifier = { }

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		visible = {
		}

		complete_effect = {
			every_state = {
				limit = {NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
		}
		
	}

DEBUG_Core_Owned_States = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats

		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 0
		modifier = { }

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		visible = {
		}

		complete_effect = {
			every_state = {
				limit = { is_controlled_by = FROM NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
		}
		
	}
	
	DEBUG_Transfer_Cores = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats

		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 0
		modifier = { }

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		visible = {
		}

		complete_effect = {
			every_state = {
				limit = { NOT = { is_owned_by = FROM } is_core_of = FROM }
				FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
		
	}

}

	release_puppet_targeted_decision = {
	
		icon = SWI_swiss_democratic_tradition_campaign
		
		allowed = {
		}
	
        visible = {
		
        }
        target_trigger = {
            FROM = {
                is_subject_of = ROOT
            }
        }
        cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

        available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
				FROM = {
					surrender_progress < 0.01	
				}
				ROOT = {
					surrender_progress < 0.01	
				}
        }
		complete_effect = {
		}
        remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			end_puppet = FROM
        }
    }
	
	
}

#Greater Germany
GER_Coring_Decisions = {

	#Easy German Cores

	#Free City of Danzig
	GER_Core_Danzig = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats

		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			85 = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_controlled_by = FROM
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			85 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			85 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#GDYNIA
	GER_Core_West_Prussia = {

		}

		visible = {
			28 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			28 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
				set_state_name = "Elsaß-Lothringen"
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Sudetenland
	GER_Core_Sudetenland = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CZE
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 69
							state = 74
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 69
							state = 74
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = CZE
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 69
							state = 74
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Moderate German Cores
	
	#Non Sudetenland Czech Lands
	GER_Core_Czech_Lands = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 40
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 10 }
		days_remove = 14

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 9
		OR = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_GRO2
			has_global_flag = FORM_HRE2
		}
		OR = {
			NOT = { has_government = fascism }
			NOT = { original_tag = GER }
			has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2
			#is_historical_focus_on = no
		}
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CZE
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 9
							state = 75
							state = 72
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
			#modifier = {
			#	factor = 0
			#	is_historical_focus_on = yes
			#	has_government = fascism
			#	date < 1945.1.1
			#	NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2 }
			#}
		}

		visible = {

			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 9
							state = 75
							state = 72
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = CZE
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 9
							state = 75
							state = 72
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = FORM_GRO2
				has_global_flag = FORM_HRE2
			}
			OR = {
				NOT = { has_government = fascism }
				NOT = { original_tag = GER }
				has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2
				#is_historical_focus_on = no
			}
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SWI
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 845
							state = 846
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
			#modifier = {
			#	factor = 0
			#	is_historical_focus_on = yes
			#	has_government = fascism
			#	date < 1945.1.1
			#	NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2 }
			#}
		}

		visible = {
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 845
							state = 846
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = SWI
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 845
							state = 846
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Very Hard German Cores
	#Venice
	GER_Core_Venedig = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats

		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			OR = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_HRE2
			has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2
			}
			OR = {
				NOT = { has_government = fascism }
				NOT = { original_tag = GER }
				has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2
				#is_historical_focus_on = no
			}
			160 = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_controlled_by = FROM
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			160 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			160 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
				set_state_name = "Venedig"
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Rest of Poland

							state = 90
							state = 88
							state = 92
							state = 91
							state = 89

					}
				}

							state = 10
							state = 90
							state = 88

							state = 91
							state = 89

				}

		}

					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = POL

							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 10
							state = 90

							state = 89
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM

							state = 646
							#Nauru
							state = 725
							#Micronesia
							is_core_of = FSM
							#Solomon Islands
							is_core_of = SOL
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							#German New Guinea
							state = 523
							state = 737
							#Saipan
							state = 646
							#Nauru
							state = 725
							#Micronesia
							is_core_of = FSM
							#Solomon Islands
							is_core_of = SOL
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
						OR = {
							#German New Guinea
							state = 523
							state = 737
							#Saipan
							state = 646
							#Nauru
							state = 725
							#Micronesia
							is_core_of = FSM
							#Solomon Islands
							is_core_of = SOL
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#German East Asia
	GER_Core_German_East_Asia = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			has_country_flag = FORM_German_Colonial_Empire2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			
			#Malaya
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Malaya_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = MAL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Vietnamese_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = VIN
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Laos_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = LAO
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Cambodian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = CAM
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = MAL
							is_core_of = INS
							is_core_of = VIN
							is_core_of = LAO
							is_core_of = CAM
							state = 721
							state = 523
							state = 737
							state = 634
							state = 591
							state = 743
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = MAL
							is_core_of = INS
							is_core_of = VIN
							is_core_of = LAO
							is_core_of = CAM
							state = 721
							state = 523
							state = 737
							state = 634
							state = 591
							state = 743
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
			
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = Integrate_Deutsch_Ostasien2 }
				}
				set_country_flag = Integrate_Deutsch_Ostasien2
				country_event = {
					id = RON_Formable_Country.1016
				}
			}
			
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = MAL
							is_core_of = INS
							is_core_of = VIN
							is_core_of = LAO
							is_core_of = CAM
							state = 721
							state = 523
							state = 737
							state = 634
							state = 591
							state = 743
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	GER_MIT_Core_Central_Africa = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
		}

		available = {
		has_country_flag = FORM_German_Colonial_Empire2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
		
		custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Congolese_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = COG
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = ZAM
							is_core_of = ANG
							is_core_of = MZB
							is_core_of = MLW
							is_core_of = COG
							is_core_of = KEN
							is_core_of = UGA
							is_core_of = CAR
							is_core_of = EQG
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = ZAM
							is_core_of = ANG
							is_core_of = MZB
							is_core_of = MLW
							is_core_of = COG
							is_core_of = KEN
							is_core_of = UGA
							is_core_of = CAR
							is_core_of = EQG
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
			
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = Integrate_Deutsch_Mittelafrika2 }
				}
				set_country_flag = Integrate_Deutsch_Mittelafrika2
				country_event = {
					id = RON_Formable_Country.1015
				}
			}
			
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
		
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = ZAM
							is_core_of = ANG
							is_core_of = MZB
							is_core_of = MLW
							is_core_of = COG
							is_core_of = KEN
							is_core_of = UGA
							is_core_of = CAR
							is_core_of = EQG
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Septemberprogramm
	RON_Septemberprogramm = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_historical_focus_on = yes
				NOT = { has_government = neutrality }
			}
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			always = no
			NOT = { has_global_flag = Realize_Septemberprogramm2 }
			original_tag = GER
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_German_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = GER
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			#Polish Corridor
			85 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			86 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			807 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			762 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			#Memel
			188 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			#Alsace
			28 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			#Northern Schleswig
			912 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			#Luxembourg
			8 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }

		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.1002
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = Realize_Septemberprogramm2
			}
		}
	}
	
	#Greater Germany
	RON_Formable_Decision0 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_historical_focus_on = yes
				has_government = fascism
				OR = {
					date < 1943.1.1
					has_war = yes
				}
			}
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_GRO2 }
			OR = {
				original_tag = GER
				original_tag = AUS
				original_tag = SWI
				original_tag = LUX
			}
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_German_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = GER
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Austrian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = AUS
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			#Polish Corridor
			85 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			86 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			807 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			762 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }

			#Memel
			188 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }

			#Alsace
			28 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			#Northern Sleswig
			#912 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			#Sudetenland
			69 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			74 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.0
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_GRO2
			}
		}
	}
	
}	

#Greater Germanic Reich
GGR_Coring_Decisions = {

#Hard Cores
#Whole Denmark
	GGR_Core_Denmark = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores Danish States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 40
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 10 }
		days_remove = 14

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 9
			has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = DEN
						OR = {
							any_neighbor_state = {
								is_core_of = FROM
							}
							state = 910
						}
						NOT = {
							state = 100
							state = 101
							state = 337
							state = 912
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = DEN
						NOT = {
							state = 100
							state = 101
							state = 337
							state = 912
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = DEN
						OR = {
							any_neighbor_state = {
								is_core_of = FROM
							}
							state = 910
						}
						NOT = {
							state = 100
							state = 101
							state = 337
							state = 912
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

			has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = UKR
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						NOT = {
							state = 89
							state = 91
							state = 73
							state = 766
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = UKR
						NOT = {
							state = 89
							state = 91
							state = 73
							state = 766
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = UKR
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						NOT = {
							state = 89
							state = 91
							state = 73
							state = 766
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Whole Russia
	GGR_Core_Russia = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14	
			has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SOV
						NOT = {
							is_core_of = UKR
							is_core_of = BLR
							is_core_of = LIT
							is_core_of = LAT
							is_core_of = EST
							is_core_of = ROM
							is_core_of = FIN
							is_core_of = GEO
							is_core_of = ARM
							is_core_of = AZR
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 351
							state = 262
							state = 581
							state = 573
							state = 582
							state = 999
							state = 406
							state = 236
							state = 407
							state = 401
							state = 239
							state = 400
							state = 398
							state = 252
							state = 255
							state = 256
							state = 397
							state = 399
							state = 249
							state = 651
							state = 652
							state = 250
							state = 251
							state = 825
							state = 880
							state = 829
							state = 833
							is_on_continent = europe
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SOV
						NOT = {
							is_core_of = UKR
							is_core_of = BLR
							is_core_of = LIT
							is_core_of = LAT
							is_core_of = EST
							is_core_of = ROM
							is_core_of = FIN
							is_core_of = GEO
							is_core_of = ARM
							is_core_of = AZR
						}
						OR = {
							state = 351
							state = 262
							state = 581
							state = 573
							state = 582
							state = 999
							state = 406
							state = 236
							state = 407
							state = 401
							state = 239
							state = 400
							state = 398
							state = 252
							state = 255
							state = 256
							state = 397
							state = 399
							state = 249
							state = 651
							state = 652
							state = 250
							state = 251
							state = 825
							state = 880
							state = 829
							state = 833
							is_on_continent = europe
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SOV
						NOT = {
							is_core_of = UKR
							is_core_of = BLR
							is_core_of = LIT
							is_core_of = LAT
							is_core_of = EST
							is_core_of = ROM
							is_core_of = FIN
							is_core_of = GEO
							is_core_of = ARM
							is_core_of = AZR
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 351
							state = 262
							state = 581
							state = 573
							state = 582
							state = 999
							state = 406
							state = 236
							state = 407
							state = 401
							state = 239
							state = 400
							state = 398
							state = 252
							state = 255
							state = 256
							state = 397
							state = 399
							state = 249
							state = 651
							state = 652
							state = 250
							state = 251
							state = 825
							state = 880
							state = 829
							state = 833
							is_on_continent = europe
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}

	#Saskatchewan
	GGR_Start_Core_Canada = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats

		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			has_country_flag = FORM_German_Colonial_Empire2
			has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 25
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_USA_Neutralized_tt
				OR = {
						USA = {
							has_capitulated = yes
						}
						USA = {
							exists = no
						}
						USA = {
							is_subject_of = GER
						}
						USA = {
							is_subject_of = JAP
						}
						AND = {
							USA = { surrender_progress > 0.6 }
							OR = {
								GER = {
									controls_state = 361
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = GER
									controls_state = 361
								}
								JAP = {
									controls_state = 361
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = JAP
									controls_state = 361
								}
							}
							OR = {
								GER = {
									controls_state = 378
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = GER
									controls_state = 378
								}
								JAP = {
									controls_state = 378
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = JAP
									controls_state = 378
								}
							}
						}
					}
			}
			
			469 = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_controlled_by = FROM
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			469 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
			
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = Integrate_Deutsch_Nordamerika2 }
				}
				set_country_flag = Integrate_Deutsch_Nordamerika2
				country_event = {
					id = RON_Formable_Country.1017
				}
			}
			
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			469 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = JAP
									controls_state = 378
								}
							}
						}
					}
			}
		
		custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_JAP_Neutralized_tt
				OR = {
						JAP = {
							has_capitulated = yes
						}
						JAP = {
							exists = no
						}
						JAP = {
							is_subject_of = GER
						}
						AND = {
							JAP = { surrender_progress > 0.6 }
							OR = {
								GER = {
									controls_state = 282
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = GER
									controls_state = 282
								}
							}
						}
					}
			}
		
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = USA
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = USA
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = USA
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Whole CAN
	GGR_Core_Rest_of_Canada = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_country_flag = FORM_German_Colonial_Empire2
		has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
		
		custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_USA_Neutralized_tt
				OR = {
						USA = {
							has_capitulated = yes
						}
						USA = {
							exists = no
						}
						USA = {
							is_subject_of = GER
						}
						USA = {
							is_subject_of = JAP
						}
						AND = {
							USA = { surrender_progress > 0.6 }
							OR = {
								GER = {
									controls_state = 361
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = GER
									controls_state = 361
								}
								JAP = {
									controls_state = 361
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = JAP
									controls_state = 361
								}
							}
							OR = {
								GER = {
									controls_state = 378
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = GER
									controls_state = 378
								}
								JAP = {
									controls_state = 378
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = JAP
									controls_state = 378
								}
							}
						}
					}
			}
		
		custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_JAP_Neutralized_tt
				OR = {
						JAP = {
							has_capitulated = yes
						}
						JAP = {
							exists = no
						}
						JAP = {
							is_subject_of = GER
						}
						AND = {
							JAP = { surrender_progress > 0.6 }
							OR = {
								GER = {
									controls_state = 282
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = GER
									controls_state = 282
								}
							}
						}
					}
			}
		
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CAN
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CAN
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = CAN
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Whole Caribbean
	GGR_Core_Caribbean = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		#has_country_flag = FORM_German_Colonial_Empire2
		#has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2
		OR = {
			has_country_flag = Integrate_Deutsch_Nordamerika2
			has_country_flag = Integrate_Deutsch_Sudamerika2
		}
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
		
		OR = {
			
			any_controlled_state = {
				AND = {
					is_core_of = VEN
					is_core_of = FROM
				}
			}
			
			366 = {
				is_controlled_by = FROM
				is_core_of = FROM
			}
			
		}
		
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = CUB
							is_core_of = JAM
							is_core_of = BAH
							is_core_of = DOM
							is_core_of = HAI
							is_core_of = CRC
							is_core_of = PUE
							is_core_of = TRI
							state = 694
							state = 308
							state = 692
						}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = CUB
							is_core_of = JAM
							is_core_of = BAH
							is_core_of = DOM
							is_core_of = HAI
							is_core_of = CRC
							is_core_of = PUE
							is_core_of = TRI
							state = 694
							state = 308
							state = 692
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = CUB
							is_core_of = JAM
							is_core_of = BAH
							is_core_of = DOM
							is_core_of = HAI
							is_core_of = CRC
							is_core_of = PUE
							is_core_of = TRI
							state = 694
							state = 308
							state = 692
						}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Rio Grande
	GGR_Start_Core_Brazil = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats

		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			has_country_flag = FORM_German_Colonial_Empire2
			has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 25
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_USA_Neutralized_tt
				OR = {
						USA = {
							has_capitulated = yes
						}
						USA = {
							exists = no
						}
						USA = {
							is_subject_of = GER
						}
						USA = {
							is_subject_of = JAP
						}
						AND = {
							USA = { surrender_progress > 0.6 }
							OR = {
								GER = {
									controls_state = 361
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = GER
									controls_state = 361
								}
								JAP = {
									controls_state = 361
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = JAP
									controls_state = 361
								}
							}
							OR = {
								GER = {
									controls_state = 378
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = GER
									controls_state = 378
								}
								JAP = {
									controls_state = 378
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = JAP
									controls_state = 378
								}
							}
						}
					}
			}
			
			502 = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_controlled_by = FROM
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			502 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
			
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = Integrate_Deutsch_Sudamerika2 }
				}
				set_country_flag = Integrate_Deutsch_Sudamerika2
				country_event = {
					id = RON_Formable_Country.1018
				}
			}
			
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			502 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			512 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	GGR_Core_Argentina = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		has_country_flag = FORM_German_Colonial_Empire2
		has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ARG
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ARG
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = ARG
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}

	#Patagonia
	GGR_Start_Core_Chile = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats

		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			has_country_flag = FORM_German_Colonial_Empire2
			has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 25
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_USA_Neutralized_tt
				OR = {
						USA = {
							has_capitulated = yes
						}
						USA = {
							exists = no
						}
						USA = {
							is_subject_of = GER
						}
						USA = {
							is_subject_of = JAP
						}
						AND = {
							USA = { surrender_progress > 0.6 }
							OR = {
								GER = {
									controls_state = 361
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = GER
									controls_state = 361
								}
								JAP = {
									controls_state = 361
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = JAP
									controls_state = 361
								}
							}
							OR = {
								GER = {
									controls_state = 378
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = GER
									controls_state = 378
								}
								JAP = {
									controls_state = 378
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = JAP
									controls_state = 378
								}
							}
						}
					}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_JAP_Neutralized_tt
				OR = {
						JAP = {
							has_capitulated = yes
						}
						JAP = {
							exists = no
						}
						JAP = {
							is_subject_of = GER
						}
						AND = {
							JAP = { surrender_progress > 0.6 }
							OR = {
								GER = {
									controls_state = 282
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = GER
									controls_state = 282
								}
							}
						}
					}
			}
		
		
			
			279 = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_controlled_by = FROM
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			279 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
			
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = Integrate_Deutsch_Sudamerika2 }
				}
				set_country_flag = Integrate_Deutsch_Sudamerika2
				country_event = {
					id = RON_Formable_Country.1018
				}
			}
			
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			279 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}

#Whole Chile
	GGR_Core_Chile = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_country_flag = FORM_German_Colonial_Empire2
		has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
		
		custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_USA_Neutralized_tt
				OR = {
						USA = {
							has_capitulated = yes
						}
						USA = {
							exists = no
						}
						USA = {
							is_subject_of = GER
						}

							is_subject_of = JAP
						}

							USA = { surrender_progress > 0.6 }
							OR = {

								}

									controls_state = 361
								}

									controls_state = 361

									is_in_faction_with = JAP

									controls_state = 378
								}

									is_in_faction_with = GER
									controls_state = 378
								}

									controls_state = 378
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = JAP
									controls_state = 378
								}
							}
						}
					}
			}
		
		custom_trigger_tooltip = {

				OR = {
						JAP = {
							has_capitulated = yes
						}

							exists = no

							OR = {
								GER = {
									controls_state = 282
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = GER
									controls_state = 282
								}
							}
						}
					}
			}
		
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CHL
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		
			
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}

						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CHL
					}
				}

		}

			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}

			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }

				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = CHL
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Greater Germanic Reich
	RON_Formable_Decision1 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_historical_focus_on = yes
				has_government = fascism
				OR = {
					date < 1945.1.1
					has_war = yes
				}
			}
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2 }
			original_tag = GER
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			has_global_flag = FORM_GRO2
			has_government = fascism
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_POL_Neutralized_tt
				OR = {

								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = GER
									controls_state = 195
								}
							}
						}
					}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_ENG_Neutralized_tt
				OR = {
					ENG = {

						}
					}
				}
			}
			}

				tooltip = RON_Controls_German_States_tt
				all_state = {

						limit = {
							is_core_of = GER
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Austrian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = AUS
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			#Polish Corridor
			85 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			86 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			807 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			762 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }

			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress

		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			165 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
				set_state_name = "Catalogne"
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Rhineland
	FRA_Core_Rhineland = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14	
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = GER
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 51
							state = 42
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {

			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 51
							state = 42
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = GER
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 51
							state = 42

					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 268
							state = 543
							state = 708
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
						OR = {
							state = 268
							state = 543
							state = 708
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#French Syria
	FRA_Core_French_Syria = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			has_global_flag = Form_French_Union2
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						#No land connection
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
						OR = {
							is_core_of =  SYR
							is_core_of =  LEB
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of =  SYR
							is_core_of =  LEB
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
						OR = {
							is_core_of =  SYR
							is_core_of =  LEB

	#Greater France
	RON_Formable_Decision119 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = Form_Greater_France2 }
			original_tag = FRA
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_French_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = FRA
							NOT = { is_core_of = ALG }
							NOT = { state = 1 }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Belgian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BEL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Left_Bank_tt
				AND = {
					42 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
					51 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				}
			}
			
			#Brabant
			35 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			#Luxembourg
			8 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }

		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.119
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = Form_Greater_France2
			}
		}
	}

#British Empire
#No decisions have a neiughbouring state requirement, because Britain is an Island
ENG_Coring_Decisions = {

#Easy British Cores
	#Whole Ireland
	ENG_Core_Ireland = {

		icon = eng_ally_imperialist_coup
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores Irish States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = IRE
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = IRE
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = IRE
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Medium British Cores

				has_global_flag = Form_CANZUK2

						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }

						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = RAJ
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {

						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = RAJ
						#any_neighbor_state = {

		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = ZAM
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#American Possesions
	ENG_Core_American_Possesions = {

		icon = eng_ally_imperialist_coup
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14

				has_global_flag = FORM_BIF2

						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }

							state = 308
							state = 692
							state = 691
							state = 687
							state = 311

					}
				}
		}

			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}

							state = 690
							state = 693
							state = 689
							state = 308
							state = 692
							state = 691
							state = 687
							state = 311
							state = 299
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}

						#}

							state = 696

							state = 693
							state = 689
							state = 308
							state = 692
							state = 691
							state = 687

							state = 299
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_BRI2 }
			original_tag = ENG
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_British_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = ENG
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Irish_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = IRE
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}

		}

				id = RON_Formable_Country.68
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_BRI2

#Greater Russia
SOV_Coring_Decisions = {

#Easy Russian Cores

#Whole Ukraine
	SOV_Core_Ukranian_Lands = {

		icon = SOV_the_stalin_constitution
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = UKR
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = UKR
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = UKR
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Medium Cores
	#Congress Poland
	
	#Congress Poland
	SOV_Core_Congress_Poland = {

		icon = SOV_the_stalin_constitution
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 40
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 10 }
		days_remove = 14

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 9
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						is_core_of = POL
						OR = { 
							state = 87
							state = 98
							state = 10
							state = 90
							state = 92
							state = 97
							state = 814
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_global_flag = Form_Slavic_Union2
					has_global_flag = FORM_Greater_Russia2
					has_global_flag = FORM_RUE2
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = POL
						OR = { 
							state = 87
							state = 98
							state = 10
							state = 90
							state = 92
							state = 97
							state = 814
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						is_core_of = POL
						OR = { 
							state = 87
							state = 98
							state = 10
							state = 90
							state = 92
							state = 97
							state = 814
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Romanian Annexations
	SOV_Core_Romanian_Annexations = {

		icon = SOV_the_stalin_constitution
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 40
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 10 }
		days_remove = 14

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 9
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						is_core_of = ROM
						OR = { 
							state = 80
							state = 78
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ROM
						OR = { 
							state = 80
							state = 78
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						is_core_of = ROM
						OR = { 
							state = 80
							state = 78
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress

	#Austrian Poland

		icon = SOV_the_stalin_constitution
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
		
		OR = {
			has_global_flag = Form_Slavic_Union2
			has_global_flag = FORM_Greater_Russia2
			has_global_flag = FORM_RUE2
		}
		
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						is_core_of = POL
						state = 88
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_global_flag = Form_Slavic_Union2
					has_global_flag = FORM_Greater_Russia2
					has_global_flag = FORM_RUE2
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = POL
						state = 88
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						is_core_of = POL
						state = 88
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}

					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = TAN
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = TAN
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Whole Yugoslavia
	SOV_Core_Yugoslavia = {

		icon = SOV_the_stalin_constitution
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = Form_Slavic_Union2
				has_global_flag = FORM_Greater_Russia2
			}
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = YUG
							state = 736
							state = 852
							state = 163
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_global_flag = Form_Slavic_Union2
					has_global_flag = FORM_Greater_Russia2
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = YUG
							state = 736
							state = 852
							state = 163
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}

				}

						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}

							is_core_of = FROM

				tooltip = RON_Controls_Manchurian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = MAN
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Inner_Mongolian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = MEN
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
		}
	}
}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.104
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_Greater_Russia2
			}
		}
	}
	
	#Slavic Union
	RON_Formable_Decision127 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_historical_focus_on = yes
				has_government = communism
				OR = {
					date < 1946.1.1
					has_war = yes
				}
			}
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = Form_Slavic_Union2 }
			original_tag = SOV
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Russian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SOV
							NOT = { is_core_of = BLR }
							NOT = { is_core_of = UKR }
							NOT = { is_core_of = TAN }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Belarusian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BLR
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Ukranian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = UKR
							NOT = { is_core_of = ROM }
							NOT = { is_core_of = CZE }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Polish_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = POL
							NOT = { is_core_of = BLR }
							NOT = { is_core_of = UKR }
							NOT = { is_core_of = LIT }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Czechoslovak_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = CZE
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Bulgarian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BUL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Yugoslav_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = YUG
							NOT = {
								state = 163
								state = 852
								state = 736
							}
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.127
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = Form_Slavic_Union2
			}
		}
	}

}

#Greater America
USA_Coring_Decisions = {

#Whole Canada
	USA_Core_Canada = {

		icon = eng_puppet_usa
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CAN
						OR = {
							any_neighbor_state = {
								is_core_of = FROM
							}
							state = 331
							state = 739
							state = 740
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CAN
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = CAN
						OR = {
							any_neighbor_state = {
								is_core_of = FROM
							}
							state = 331
							state = 739
							state = 740
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = VEN
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Whole Guyanas
	USA_Core_Guyanas = {

		icon = eng_puppet_usa
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			OR = { 
				has_global_flag = FORM_GOL2
				has_global_flag = FORM_The_Americas2 
			}
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 687
							state = 309
							state = 310
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 687
							state = 309
							state = 310
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							state = 687
							state = 309
							state = 310
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}

	#Very Hard British Cores
	
	#Whole South Africa
	USA_Core_South_Africa = {

		icon = eng_puppet_usa
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			has_global_flag = Form_American_Imperial_Federation2
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SAF
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SAF
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = SAF
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = SOM
							is_core_of = UGA
							is_core_of = KEN
							is_core_of = TAN
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#American Possesions

		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			has_global_flag = Form_American_Imperial_Federation2
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }

						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
						OR = {
							state = 696
							state = 690
							state = 693
							state = 689
							state = 308
							state = 692
							state = 691
							state = 687
							state = 311
							state = 299
						}
					}
				}
		}

			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 696
							state = 690
							state = 693
							state = 689
							state = 308
							state = 692
							state = 691
							state = 687
							state = 311
							state = 299
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {

						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}

							state = 299
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM

	#Whole Chinese Coast
	USA_Core_Chinese_Coast = {

		icon = eng_puppet_usa
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_Pacific_Federation2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CHI
						is_coastal = yes
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CHI
						is_coastal = yes
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = CHI
						is_coastal = yes
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

#Greater Italy
ITA_Coring_Decisions = {

#Easy Italian Cores

	#Corsica
	ITA_Core_Corsica = {

		icon = ITA_italian_east_africa

		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			1 = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_controlled_by = FROM
						#Its an Island
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			1 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			1 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Mediterranean Islands
	ITA_Core_Mediterranean_Islands = {

		icon = ITA_italian_east_africa
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						#No land connection
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
						OR = {
							state = 1
							state = 177
							state = 116
							state = 182
							state = 183
							state = 187
							state = 164
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 1
							state = 177
							state = 116
							state = 182
							state = 183
							state = 187
							state = 164
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
						OR = {
							state = 1
							state = 177
							state = 116
							state = 182
							state = 183
							state = 187
							state = 164
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Savoy
	ITA_Core_Savoy = {

		icon = ITA_italian_east_africa

		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		}

		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4

						is_controlled_by = FROM

							is_core_of = FROM
						}

				}
		}

			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			735 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			735 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress

	#South East France
	ITA_Core_South_East_France = {

		icon = ITA_italian_east_africa
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 40
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 10 }
		days_remove = 14

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = FORM_WROE2
				has_global_flag = FORM_ROE2
				has_global_flag = Form_Greater_Italy2
				has_global_flag = Mussolinis_Ambitions2
			}
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 9
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						#No land connection
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 851
							state = 21
							state = 32
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 851
							state = 21
							state = 32
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 851
							state = 21
							state = 32
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Yugoslav Coast

	#Whole Spain
	ITA_Core_Spain = {

		icon = ITA_italian_east_africa
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = FORM_WROE2
				has_global_flag = FORM_ROE2
			}
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = SPR
							state = 118
						}
						NOT = { state = 177 }
						NOT = { state = 178 }
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = SPR
							state = 118
						}
						NOT = { state = 177 }
						NOT = { state = 178 }
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = SPR
							state = 118
						}
						NOT = { state = 177 }
						NOT = { state = 178 }
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
