	#Whole Belgium
	ITA_Core_Belgium = {

		icon = ITA_italian_east_africa
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = FORM_WROE2
				has_global_flag = FORM_ROE2
			}
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = BEL
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = BEL
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = BEL
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM

				has_global_flag = Mussolinis_Ambitions2
			}
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = JOR
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = JOR
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = JOR
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Italian Empire/Greater Italy
	RON_Formable_Decision121 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = Form_Greater_Italy2 }
			original_tag = ITA
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Italian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = ITA
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			#French States
			1 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			735 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }

			#Yugoslavian States
			853 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			163 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			103 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			#Ticino
			846 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			#Malta
			116 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.121
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = Form_Greater_Italy2
			}
		}
	}
	
	#Il Duce's Ambitions Realized
	RON_Formable_Decision1000 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = Mussolinis_Ambitions2 }
			original_tag = ITA
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Italian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = ITA
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			#French States
			1 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			735 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }

			#Yugoslavian States
			163 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			103 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			#Ljbljana
			OR = {
				853 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				any_other_country = {
					is_in_faction_with = FROM
					controls_state = 853
				}
			}
			
			#Ticino
			846 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			#Malta
			116 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			#Montenegro
			OR = {
				105 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				AND = { 
					MNT = { is_subject_of = FROM }
					MNT = { controls_state = 105 }
				}
			}
			
			#Albania
			OR = {
				44 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				AND = { 
					ALB = { is_subject_of = FROM }
					ALB = { controls_state = 44 }
				}
			}
			
			#Greece
			47 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			185 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			186 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }

				805 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				AND = { 
					ALB = { is_subject_of = FROM }
					ALB = { controls_state = 805 }
				}
			}

				tooltip = RON_Controls_Tunisian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = TUN
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Libyan_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = LBA
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Egyptian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = EGY
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Sudanese_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SUD
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			OR = { 
				AND = { 
					custom_trigger_tooltip = {
						tooltip = RON_Controls_Ethiopian_States_tt
						all_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									is_core_of = ETH
								}
								is_controlled_by = FROM
							}
						}
					}

								}

							}
						}
					}

						tooltip = RON_Controls_Somalian_States_tt
						all_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									is_core_of = SOM
								}
								is_controlled_by = FROM
							}
						}
					}
				}
				AND = { 
					AOI = { is_subject_of = FROM }
					custom_trigger_tooltip = {
						tooltip = RON_Controls_Ethiopian_States_tt
						all_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									is_core_of = ETH
								}
								is_controlled_by = AOI
							}
						}
					}
					
					custom_trigger_tooltip = {
						tooltip = RON_Controls_Eritrean_States_tt
						all_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									is_core_of = ERI
								}
								is_controlled_by = AOI
							}
						}
					}
					
					custom_trigger_tooltip = {
						tooltip = RON_Controls_Somalian_States_tt
						all_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									is_core_of = SOM
								}
								is_controlled_by = AOI
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.1000
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = Mussolinis_Ambitions2
			}
		}
	}
	
	#Western Roman Empire
	RON_Formable_Decision85 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_WROE2 }

							is_core_of = ITA

					}

						limit = {
							is_core_of = FRA
							NOT = { is_core_of = ALG }
							NOT = { state = 1 }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Spanish_States_tt

#Greater Japan
JAP_Coring_Decisions = {

#Whole Taiwan
	JAP_Core_Taiwan = {

		icon = jap_pacific_guardian
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						state = 524
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						state = 524
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						state = 524
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Whole Korea
	JAP_Core_Korea = {

		icon = jap_pacific_guardian
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one

						#}
					}

	#Whole Pacific Islands
	JAP_Core_Pacific_Islands = {

		icon = jap_pacific_guardian
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 648
							state = 647
							state = 684
							state = 633
							#Non Starting Japanese
							state = 629
							state = 630
							state = 631
							state = 632
							state = 727
							state = 642
							state = 638
							state = 725
							state = 639
							state = 643
							state = 726
							state = 636
							state = 734
							state = 635
							state = 641
							state = 875
							state = 650
						}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 648
							state = 647
							state = 684

							state = 632
							state = 727
							state = 642

							state = 643
							state = 726
							state = 636
							state = 734
							state = 635
							state = 641
							state = 875
							state = 650
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {

						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}

							state = 648
							state = 647
							state = 684
							state = 633
							#Non Starting Japanese
							state = 629
							state = 630
							state = 631
							state = 632
							state = 727
							state = 642
							state = 638
							state = 725
							state = 639
							state = 643
							state = 726
							state = 636
							state = 734
							state = 635
							state = 641
							state = 875
							state = 650
						}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}

	JAP_Core_Manchukuo = {

		icon = jap_pacific_guardian
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 40
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 10 }
		days_remove = 14

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 9
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = MAN
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0

					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = MAN
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {

					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}

							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}

				add_core_of = FROM

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 9
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = MEN
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = MEN
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = MEN
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = RAJ
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = RAJ
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#British Columbia
	JAP_Start_Core_British_Columbia = {

		icon = jap_pacific_guardian

		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_Greater_East_Asia2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 25
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_USA_Neutralized_tt
				OR = {
						USA = {
							has_capitulated = yes
						}
						USA = {
							exists = no
						}
						USA = {
							is_subject_of = GER
						}
						USA = {
							is_subject_of = JAP
						}
						AND = {
							USA = { surrender_progress > 0.6 }
							OR = {
								GER = {
									controls_state = 361
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = GER
									controls_state = 361
								}
								JAP = {
									controls_state = 361
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = JAP
									controls_state = 361
								}
							}
							OR = {
								GER = {
									controls_state = 378
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = GER
									controls_state = 378
								}
								JAP = {
									controls_state = 378
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = JAP
									controls_state = 378
								}
							}
						}
					}
			}
			
			473 = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_controlled_by = FROM
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			473 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
			
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = Integrate_Japanese_North_America2 }
				}
				set_country_flag = Integrate_Japanese_North_America2
				country_event = {
					id = RON_Formable_Country.1013
				}
			}
			
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			473 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = CAN
						OR = {
							state = 864
							state = 471
							state = 473
							#state = 739
							#state = 740
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

#California
	JAP_Start_Core_California = {

		icon = jap_pacific_guardian

		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_Greater_East_Asia2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 25
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_USA_Neutralized_tt
				OR = {
						USA = {
							has_capitulated = yes
						}
						USA = {
							exists = no
						}
						USA = {
							is_subject_of = GER
						}
						USA = {
							is_subject_of = JAP
						}
						AND = {
							USA = { surrender_progress > 0.6 }
							OR = {
								GER = {
									controls_state = 361
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = GER
									controls_state = 361
								}
								JAP = {
									controls_state = 361
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = JAP
									controls_state = 361
								}
							}
							OR = {
								GER = {
									controls_state = 378
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = GER
									controls_state = 378
								}
								JAP = {
									controls_state = 378
								}
								any_other_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = JAP
									controls_state = 378
								}
							}
						}
					}
			}
			
			378 = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_controlled_by = FROM
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			378 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
			
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = Integrate_Japanese_North_America2 }
				}
				set_country_flag = Integrate_Japanese_North_America2
				country_event = {
					id = RON_Formable_Country.1013
				}
			}
			
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			378 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Whole USA
	JAP_Core_USA = {

		icon = jap_pacific_guardian
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_Greater_East_Asia2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 25
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = USA
						OR = {
							state = 385
							state = 386
							state = 378
							state = 379
							state = 377
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = USA
						OR = {
							state = 385
							state = 386
							state = 378
							state = 379
							state = 377
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = USA
						OR = {
							state = 385
							state = 386
							state = 378
							state = 379
							state = 377
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress

	#Greater Japan
	RON_Formable_Decision133 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = Form_Greater_Japan2 }
			original_tag = JAP
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Japanese_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = JAP
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			#North Sakhalin
			655 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			#Taiwan
			524 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Korean_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = KOR
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			OR = {
			AND = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Manchurian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = MAN
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Inner_Mongolian_States_tt
				all_state = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data

		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			118 = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_controlled_by = FROM
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			118 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			118 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }

						is_coastal = yes
					}
				}
		}

			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0

					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = MEX
						is_coastal = yes
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = MEX
						is_coastal = yes
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	SPR_Core_Mexico = {

		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14

					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = MEX
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}

	#Central America
	SPR_Core_Central_America = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_Hispanosphere2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = GUA
							is_core_of = ELS
							is_core_of = HON
							is_core_of = COS
							is_core_of = NIC
							is_core_of = PAN
							is_core_of = BLZ
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = GUA
							is_core_of = ELS
							is_core_of = HON
							is_core_of = COS
							is_core_of = NIC
							is_core_of = PAN
							is_core_of = BLZ
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = GUA
							is_core_of = ELS
							is_core_of = HON
							is_core_of = COS
							is_core_of = NIC
							is_core_of = PAN
							is_core_of = BLZ
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = URG
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = URG
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Greater Spain
	RON_Formable_Decision124 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = Form_Greater_Spain2 }
			original_tag = SPR
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Spanish_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SPR
							NOT = { state = 177 }
							NOT = { state = 178 }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Portuguese_States_tt
				180 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				181 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				112 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				795 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				179 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			}
			
			#Gibraltar
			118 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }

			#France
			19 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			806 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			31 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.124
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = Form_Greater_Spain2
			}
		}
	}

					}

					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = ARG
							is_island_state = no
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			

		}
		icon = generic_form_nation

				id = RON_Formable_Country.91
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_Hispanosphere2
			}
		}
	}

#Greater Portugal
POR_Coring_Decisions = {

#Gibraltar
	POR_Core_Gibraltar = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data

		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_IBE2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			118 = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_controlled_by = FROM
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			118 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			118 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Gibraltar
	POR_Core_Galizia = {

			171 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			171 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Whole Spain
	POR_Core_Spain = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 40
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 10 }
		days_remove = 14

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_IBE2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 9
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SPR
						OR = {
							state = 177
							state = 178
							any_neighbor_state = {
								is_core_of = FROM
							}
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SPR
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = SPR
						OR = {
							state = 177
							state = 178
							any_neighbor_state = {
								is_core_of = FROM
							}
						}
					}
				}

					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = ECU
						OR = {
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
							state = 649
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Whole Peru
	POR_Core_Peru = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		AND = {
				has_global_flag = FORM_IBE2
				has_global_flag = FORM_Lusosphere2
			}
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = PRU
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = PRU
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = PRU
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_Greater_Portugal2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Portuguese_States_tt
				180 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				181 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				112 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				795 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				179 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			}
			
			#Galizia
			171 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.1001
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_Greater_Portugal2
			}
		}
	}
	
	#Iberian Union
	POR_Formable_Decision10 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_IBE2 }
		}

				tooltip = RON_Controls_Spanish_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SPR
							NOT = { state = 177 }
							NOT = { state = 178 }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Portuguese_States_tt
				180 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				181 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				112 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				795 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				179 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			}

		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.10
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_IBE2
			}
		}
	}
	
	#Portugal Brazil
	RON_Formable_Decision147 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = Form_Portugal_Brazil_Union2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Portuguese_States_tt
				180 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				181 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				112 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				795 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				179 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Brazilian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BRA
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			

		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.147
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = Form_Portugal_Brazil_Union2
			}
		}
	}

#Greater Netherlands
HOL_Coring_Decisions = {

#Luxembourg
	HOL_Core_Luxembourg = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data

		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			8 = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_controlled_by = FROM
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			8 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			8 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Brabant

	#Netherlands
	HOL_Core_Netherlands = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = HOL
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						NOT = {
							state = 35
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = HOL
						NOT = {
							state = 35
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = HOL
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						NOT = {
							state = 35
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

							}

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }

		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21
		allowed = {
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = FORM_Belgian_Empire2 }
		}
		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = FORM_BEN2
				has_global_flag = FORM_Greater_Netherlands2
				original_tag = BEL
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Belgian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BEL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Congolese_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = COG
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			#Rwanda
			768 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			#Burundi
			769 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
		}
		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.1005
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_country_flag = FORM_Belgian_Empire2
			}
		}
	}
	
	#Benelux

#Greater Sweden
SWE_Coring_Decisions = {

#Denmark
	NOR_Crossing_The_North_Sea = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow One Time
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			OR = {
				original_tag = NOR
				original_tag = SWE
				original_tag = FIN
			}
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			
			OR = {
				110 = { is_core_of = ROOT }
				921 = { is_core_of = ROOT }
				922 = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			}	
			
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = DEN
						state = 99
					}
				}

		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = DEN
						state = 99
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = DEN
						state = 99
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

#Whole Denmark
	SWE_Core_Denmark = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores Danish States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = DEN
						OR = {
							any_neighbor_state = {
								is_core_of = FROM
							}
							state = 910
						}
						NOT = {
							state = 100
							state = 101
							state = 337
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = DEN
						NOT = {
							state = 100
							state = 101
							state = 337
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = DEN
						OR = {
							any_neighbor_state = {
								is_core_of = FROM
							}
							state = 910
						}
						NOT = {
							state = 100
							state = 101
							state = 337
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
#Very Hard Cores
#Whole Sweden
	SWE_Core_Sweden = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SWE
						OR = {
							any_neighbor_state = {
								is_core_of = FROM
							}
							state = 124
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SWE
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = SWE
						OR = {
							any_neighbor_state = {
								is_core_of = FROM
							}
							state = 124
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}

	SWE_Core_Latvia = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = FORM_Nordic_Union2
				has_global_flag = FORM_SEP2
			}
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = LAT
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = LAT
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = LAT
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Greater Finland
	SWE_Core_Greater_Finland = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						#No land connection
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 213
							state = 215
							state = 216
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 213
							state = 215
							state = 216
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 213
							state = 215
							state = 216
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}

	#England
	DEN_Core_England = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			OR = {
				original_tag = DEN
				original_tag = NOR
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_NSE2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						#No land connection
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
						is_core_of = ENG
						NOT = { is_core_of = IRE }
						NOT = { is_core_of = WLS }
						NOT = { is_core_of = SCO }
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ENG
						NOT = { is_core_of = IRE }
						NOT = { is_core_of = WLS }
						NOT = { is_core_of = SCO }
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
						is_core_of = ENG
						NOT = { is_core_of = IRE }
						NOT = { is_core_of = WLS }
						NOT = { is_core_of = SCO }
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Kalmar Union
	RON_Formable_Decision11 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_SCA2 }
			OR = {
				original_tag = SWE
				original_tag = DEN
				original_tag = NOR
			}
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Swedish_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SWE
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Norwegian_States_tt
				110 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				142 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				143 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				144 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				920 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				921 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				922 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				923 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				924 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				925 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Danish_States_tt
				37 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				99 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				911 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			}
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.11
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_SCA2
			}
		}
	}

		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_KNS2 }
			OR = {
				original_tag = SWE
				original_tag = NOR
			}
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Swedish_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SWE
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Norwegian_States_tt
				110 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				142 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				143 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				144 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				920 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				921 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				922 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				923 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				924 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				925 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			}
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.95
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_KNS2
			}
		}
	}
	
	#Swedish Empire
	RON_Formable_Decision43 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {

						limit = {
							is_core_of = FIN
							NOT = { state = 722 }
							NOT = { state = 146 }
							NOT = { state = 147 }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM

				}

#Greater Baltics
LIT_Coring_Decisions = {

#Whole Lithuania
	LIT_Core_Lithuania = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4	
			
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = LIT
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = LIT
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = LIT
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Whole Latvia
	LIT_Core_Latvia = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data

#Greater Poland
POL_Coring_Decisions = {

#East Germany
	POL_Core_East_Germany = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						#No land connection
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 5
							state = 63
							state = 66
							state = 67
							state = 68
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 5
							state = 63
							state = 66
							state = 67
							state = 68
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 5
							state = 63
							state = 66
							state = 67
							state = 68
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Greater Poland
	RON_Formable_Decision1012 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = Form_Greater_Poland2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Polish_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = POL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			#East German States
			5 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			66 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			67 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			68 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			63 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.1012
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = Form_Greater_Poland2
			}
		}
	}

AUS_Coring_Decisions = {

		AUS_Core_Switzerland = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SWI
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SWI
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = SWI
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

						#is_core_of = AUH
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 850
							state = 736
							state = 852
							state = 853
							state = 102
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Extra Greater Austrian Cores
	
	#Very Hard German Cores
	#Venice
	AUS_Core_Venedig = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats

		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			has_global_flag = Form_Greater_Austria2
			160 = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_controlled_by = FROM
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			160 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			160 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
				set_state_name = "Venedig"
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Galicia
	AUS_Core_Galicia = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }

							state = 89
						}
					}
				}

		}

	#Austro Hungarian Cores
	
	#Greater Austria will be added as its own separate category
	#Greater Austria
	RON_Formable_Decision107 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = Form_Greater_Austria2 }
			original_tag = AUS
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Austrian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = AUS
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Czech_States_tt
				69 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				74 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				9 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				75 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Slovene_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SLV
							NOT = { is_core_of = ITA }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}

		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.107
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = Form_Greater_Austria2
			}
		}
	}

AUH_Coring_Decisions = {

#Silesia
	AUH_Core_Silesia = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		OR = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_AUH2
			has_global_flag = FORM_AUE2
		}
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SIL
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 66
							state = 67
							state = 762
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SIL
						OR = {
							state = 66
							state = 67
							state = 762
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = SIL
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 66
							state = 67
							state = 762
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}

			any_controlled_state = {

						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CZE
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 69
							state = 74
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 69
							state = 74
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = CZE
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 69
							state = 74
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Austrian Empire
	RON_Formable_Decision1020 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_AUE2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no

			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Austrian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = AUS
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Hungarian_States_tt
				154 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				155 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				43 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			}

		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.1020
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_AUE2
			}
		}
	}

	RON_Formable_Decision7 = {

			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_AUH2 }
		}

			#is_subject = no

			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Austrian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = AUS
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Hungarian_States_tt
				154 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				155 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				43 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			}

		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.7
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_AUH2
			}
		}
	}

}


#Erfurt Union
Erfurt_Union_Coring_Decisions = {

#Silesia
	ERF_Core_Silesia = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_Austro_Germany2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SIL
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 66
							state = 67
							state = 762
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SIL
						OR = {
							state = 66
							state = 67
							state = 762
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = SIL
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 66
							state = 67
							state = 762
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CZE
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 9
							state = 75
							state = 72
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {

			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 9
							state = 75
							state = 72
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = CZE
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 9
							state = 75
							state = 72
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Erfurt Union
	ERF_Formable_Decision97 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_Austro_Germany2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = FORM_AUH2
				has_global_flag = FORM_AUE2
				has_global_flag = FORM_German_Empire2
			}
			OR = {
				NOT = { has_government = fascism }
				NOT = { original_tag = GER }
				has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2
				#is_historical_focus_on = no
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Austrian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = AUS
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Hungarian_States_tt
				154 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				155 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				43 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_German_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = GER
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			#Polish Corridor
			85 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			86 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			807 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			762 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			#Memel
			188 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			#Alsace
			28 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			#Northern Schleswig
			#912 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }

		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.97
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_Austro_Germany2
			}
		}
	}

}

#Holy Roman Empire
Holy_Roman_Empire_Coring_Decisions = {

#AUS
	HRE_Core_AUS = {

		icon = ger_reichskommissariats
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores Austrian States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_HRE2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = AUS
							state = 39
							state = 850
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = AUS
							state = 39
							state = 850
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}

		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_HRE2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = LUX
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = LUX
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = LUX
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

							state = 9

#Holy Roman Empire
	HRE_Formable_Decision9 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
			NOT = { original_tag = SOV }
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_HRE2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_German_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = GER
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Austrian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = AUS
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Belgian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BEL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			#Luxembourg
			8 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			#Sudetenland
			69 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			74 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			#Bohemia and Moravia
			9 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			75 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			#Austrian Italy, Slovenia and Croatia
			850 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			736 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			852 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			853 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			102 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.9
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_HRE2
			}
		}
	}
	
	#Holy Russian Empire
	RON_Formable_Decision138 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_HRE2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Russian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SOV
							NOT = { is_core_of = BLR }
							NOT = { is_core_of = UKR }
							NOT = { is_core_of = TAN }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Belarusian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BLR
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Ukranian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = UKR
							OR = {
							state = 93
								AND = {
									NOT = { is_core_of = CZE }
									NOT = { is_core_of = HUN }
									NOT = { is_core_of = POL }
									NOT = { is_core_of = ROM }
								}
							}
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Latvian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = LAT
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Lithuanian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = LIT
							NOT = { is_core_of = POL }
							NOT = { is_core_of = GER }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Estonian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = EST
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Finnish_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = FIN
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			
			
			#Congress Poland
			87 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			98 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			10 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			90 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			92 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			97 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_German_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = GER
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Austrian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = AUS
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Belgian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BEL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			#Luxembourg
			8 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			#Sudetenland
			69 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			74 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			#Bohemia and Moravia
			9 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			75 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			#Austrian Italy, Slovenia and Croatia
			850 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			736 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			852 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			853 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			102 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.138
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_HRE2
			}
		}
	}

YUG_Coring_Decisions = {

#Bulgaria
	YUG_Core_Bulgaria = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			original_tag = YUG
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = BUL
							state = 77
							state = 184
							state = 731
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = BUL
							state = 77
							state = 184
							state = 731
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = BUL
							state = 77
							state = 184
							state = 731
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Albania
	YUG_Core_Albania = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			original_tag = YUG
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ALB
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ALB
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = ALB
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	YUG_Core_Thrace = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }

							state = 341
							state = 797
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {

					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 341
							state = 797
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							state = 341
							state = 797
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}

	#Greater Croatia
	RON_Formable_Decision60 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
			original_tag = CRO
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_GCR2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Croatian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = CRO
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Bosnian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BOS
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.60
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_GCR2
			}
		}
	}

					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Bulgarian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BUL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Albanian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = ALB
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.25
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_BAK2
			}
		}
	}

}

BUL_Coring_Decisions = {

#Bulgaria
	BUL_Core_Thrace = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 184
							state = 341
							state = 797
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 184
							state = 341
							state = 797
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							state = 184
							state = 341
							state = 797
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
