		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = Form_Greater_Romania2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Romanian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = ROM
							NOT = {
								is_core_of = TRA
								state = 77
							}
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			#Russian States
			192 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			198 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			834 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.131
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = Form_Greater_Romania2
			}
		}
	}

}

HUN_Coring_Decisions = {

HUN_Core_Slovakia = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 70
							state = 664
							state = 71
							state = 73
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 70
							state = 664
							state = 71
							state = 73
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							state = 70
							state = 664
							state = 71
							state = 73
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}

						is_controlled_by = FROM

							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100

				factor = 0

					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			805 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress

						limit = {
							is_core_of = GRE
							NOT = {
								state = 164
								state = 182
								state = 187
							}
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			#Turkish States
			341 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			797 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			339 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			340 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			347 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.120
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = Form_Greater_Greece2
			}
		}
	}

		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}

						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }

						NOT = {is_core_of = BAN}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}

			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}

							is_core_of = FROM

			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = AFG
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = AFG
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = AFG
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SUD
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SUD
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = SUD
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Arab League
	RON_Formable_Decision12 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_ARA2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Egyptian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = EGY
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Iraqi_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = IRQ
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Jordan_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = JOR
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Lebanese_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = LEB
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Saudi_Arabian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SAU
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Syrian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SYR
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.12
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_ARA2
			}
		}
	}

}

ARG_Coring_Decisions = {

#Whole Argentina
	ARG_Core_Argentina = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ARG
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ARG
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = ARG
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

					is_major = no

				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = CHL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			#Patagonia
			512 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.117
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = Form_Greater_Chile2
			}
		}
	}
	
	#Southern Cone
	RON_Formable_Decision101 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_Southern_Cone2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Argentinean_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = ARG
							is_island_state = no
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Chilean_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = CHL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}

				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = PAR
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}

				tooltip = RON_Controls_Uruguayan_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = URG
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
		}

				id = RON_Formable_Country.101
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_Southern_Cone2
			}
		}

#Greater Australia
AST_Coring_Decisions = {

#Australia
	AST_Core_Australia = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
		
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = AST
						#Its an Island
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = AST
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = AST
						#Its an Island
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ANG
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ANG
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = ANG
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	##African Colonies
	BRA_Core_African_Colonies_POR = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 296
							state = 705
							state = 702
							state = 321
							state = 721
							state = 729
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 296
							state = 705
							state = 702
							state = 321
							state = 721
							state = 729
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							state = 296
							state = 705
							state = 702
							state = 321
							state = 721
							state = 729
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Brazilian Empire
	RON_Formable_Decision102 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = BRA_IDB2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Brazilian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BRA
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Uruguayan_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = URG
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.102
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = BRA_IDB2
			}
		}
	}
	
	#Brazilian Empire

		ai_will_do = {

		}

CAN_Coring_Decisions = {

##Alaska
	CAN_Core_Alaska = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						state = 463
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						state = 463
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						state = 463
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

GUA_Coring_Decisions = {

#Central America
	GUA_Core_Central_America = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = GUA
							is_core_of = ELS
							is_core_of = HON
							is_core_of = COS
							is_core_of = NIC
							is_core_of = PAN
							is_core_of = BLZ
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = GUA
							is_core_of = ELS
							is_core_of = HON
							is_core_of = COS
							is_core_of = NIC
							is_core_of = PAN
							is_core_of = BLZ
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = GUA
							is_core_of = ELS
							is_core_of = HON
							is_core_of = COS
							is_core_of = NIC
							is_core_of = PAN
							is_core_of = BLZ
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Central America
	RON_Formable_Decision17 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0

				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = TIB
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#QING Empire
	RON_Formable_Decision5 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_QIN2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			#Chinese
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Chinese_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = CHI
							NOT = { state = 728 }
							NOT = { state = 729 }
							NOT = { state = 326 }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			#Mongolia
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Mongolian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = MON
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			#Tannu Tuva
			329 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Tibetan_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = TIB
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.5
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_QIN2
			}
		}
	}
	
	#Greater China
	RON_Formable_Decision35 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_CHI2 }

COL_Coring_Decisions = {

#Whole Colombia
	COL_Core_Colombia = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = COL
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = COL
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = COL
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

#Whole Italian East Africa
	ETH_Core_Abyssinia = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = ETH
							is_core_of = SOM
							is_core_of = ERI
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = ETH
							is_core_of = SOM
							is_core_of = ERI
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = ETH
							is_core_of = SOM
							is_core_of = ERI
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Abyssinia
	RON_Formable_Decision46 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_ABY2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Ethiopian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = ETH
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Eritrean_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = ERI
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Somalian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SOM
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.46
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_ABY2
			}
		}
	}

}

RAJ_Coring_Decisions = {

#Whole India
	RAJ_Core_India = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = RAJ
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = RAJ
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = RAJ
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = NEP
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = NEP
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = NEP
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Mughal Empire
	RON_Formable_Decision36 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_MUG2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Indian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = RAJ
							NOT = {
								state = 320
								state = 321
							}
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Pakistani_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = PAK
							NOT = { is_core_of = BAN }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Bangladesh_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BAN
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Afghan_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = AFG
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.36
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_MUG2
			}
		}
	}

INS_Coring_Decisions = {

#Whole Indonesia
	INS_Core_Indonesia = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = INS
							state = 721
							state = 523
							state = 737
							state = 634
						}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = INS
							state = 721
							state = 523
							state = 737
							state = 634
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = INS
							state = 721
							state = 523
							state = 737
							state = 634
						}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ISR
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = ISR
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	MEX_Core_Central_America = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = GUA
							is_core_of = ELS
							is_core_of = HON
							is_core_of = COS
							is_core_of = NIC
							is_core_of = PAN
							is_core_of = BLZ
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = GUA
							is_core_of = ELS
							is_core_of = HON
							is_core_of = COS
							is_core_of = NIC
							is_core_of = PAN
							is_core_of = BLZ
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {

						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}

							is_core_of = HON

							is_core_of = PAN

							state = 376
							state = 377
							state = 378
							state = 379
							state = 380
							state = 382

							state = 375
							state = 376
							state = 377
							state = 378
							state = 379
							state = 380
							state = 382
						}
					}
				}

		}

			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}

			random_controlled_state = {

						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = USA
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 375
							state = 376
							state = 377
							state = 378
							state = 379
							state = 380
							state = 382
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}

	#Central America
	RON_Formable_Decision23 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_MEE2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Mexican_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = MEX
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			OR  = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = RON_Controls_Central_American_States_tt
					all_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									is_core_of = GUA
									is_core_of = ELS
									is_core_of = HON
									is_core_of = COS
									is_core_of = NIC
								}
							}
							is_controlled_by = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = RON_Controls_MEX_Lost_Territories_tt
					375 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
					376 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
					377 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
					378 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
					379 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
					380 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
					382 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				}
			}
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.23
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_MEE2
			}
		}
	}

}

		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = PER
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = PER
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = PER
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Whole Pakistan

						NOT = { is_core_of = BAN }

	#Persian Empire
	RON_Formable_Decision37 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_PEE2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Persian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = PER
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Iraqi_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = IRQ
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Afghan_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = AFG
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.37
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_PEE2
			}
		}
	}

}

PRU_Coring_Decisions = {

#Whole Ecuador
	PRU_Core_Ecuador = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ECU
						OR = {
							any_neighbor_state = {
								is_core_of = FROM
							}
							state = 649
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ECU
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = ECU

							any_neighbor_state = {
								is_core_of = FROM
							}
							state = 649

					}
				}

SAF_Coring_Decisions = {

#Border States
	SAF_Core_Border_States = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = BOT
							is_core_of = ZIM
							state = 544
							state = 896
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = BOT
							is_core_of = ZIM
							state = 544
							state = 896
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = BOT
							is_core_of = ZIM
							state = 544
							state = 896
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

}

#Cyprus
	TUR_Core_Cyprus = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CYP
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CYP
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }

		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_OTT2	
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 192
							state = 198
							state = 834
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 192
							state = 198
							state = 834
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							state = 192
							state = 198
							state = 834
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Greater Turkey
	RON_Formable_Decision125 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = Form_Greater_Turkey2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Turkish_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = TUR
							NOT = {
								is_core_of = SYR
								state = 341
								state = 797
								state = 799
							}
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Iraqi_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = IRQ
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Syrian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SYR
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.125
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = Form_Greater_Turkey2
			}
		}
	}

#Balkan Federation
Balkan_Federation_Coring_Decisions = {

#YUG
	BAK_Core_YUG = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores Austrian States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_BAK2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = YUG
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = YUG
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = YUG
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

			has_global_flag = FORM_BAK2

			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 341
							state = 797
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 341
							state = 797
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							state = 341
							state = 797
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Romania Bulgaria
	RON_Formable_Decision145 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
			OR = {
				original_tag = ROM
				original_tag = BUL
			}
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = Form_Romania_Bulgaria_Union2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Romanian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = ROM
							NOT = {
								is_core_of = TRA
								state = 77
							}
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Bulgarian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BUL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.145
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = Form_Romania_Bulgaria_Union2
			}
		}
	}

							is_core_of = YUG
							NOT = {
								state = 163
								state = 852
								state = 736
							}
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}

				id = RON_Formable_Country.25

			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_BAK2
			}
		}
	}

#Roman Empire, Byzantine Empire, Western Roman Empire
Roman_Empire_Coring_Decisions = {

#Mediterranean Islands
	ROE_Core_Mediterranean_Islands = {

		icon = ITA_italian_east_africa
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = FORM_WROE2
				has_global_flag = FORM_ROE2
				has_global_flag = FORM_BYZ2
			}
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						#No land connection
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
						OR = {
							state = 1
							state = 177
							state = 116
							state = 182
							state = 183
							state = 187
							state = 164
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 1
							state = 177
							state = 116
							state = 182
							state = 183
							state = 187
							state = 164
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
						OR = {
							state = 1
							state = 177
							state = 116
							state = 182
							state = 183
							state = 187
							state = 164
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = YUG
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = YUG
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

			OR = {
				has_global_flag = FORM_WROE2
				has_global_flag = FORM_ROE2
			}
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = GER
						OR = {
							state = 51
							state = 42
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {

					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = GER
						OR = {
							state = 51
							state = 42
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = GER
						OR = {
							state = 51
							state = 42
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM

		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = UKR
						OR = {
							state = 192
							state = 197
							state = 196
							state = 200
							state = 227
							state = 218
							state = 234
							state = 137
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = UKR
						OR = {
							state = 192
							state = 197
							state = 196
							state = 200
							state = 227
							state = 218
							state = 234
							state = 137
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = UKR
						OR = {
							state = 192
							state = 197
							state = 196
							state = 200
							state = 227
							state = 218
							state = 234
							state = 137
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Western Roman Empire
	ROE_Formable_Decision85 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
			OR = {
				original_tag = FRA
				original_tag = POR
				original_tag = SPR
			}
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_WROE2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Italian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = ITA
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_French_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = FRA
							NOT = { is_core_of = ALG }
							NOT = { state = 1 }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Spanish_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SPR
							NOT = { state = 177 }
							NOT = { state = 178 }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Portuguese_States_tt
				180 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				181 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				112 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				795 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				179 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Belgian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {

	#Moscow Third Rome
	RON_Formable_Decision141 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_ROE2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Russian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SOV
							NOT = { is_core_of = BLR }
							NOT = { is_core_of = UKR }
							NOT = { is_core_of = TAN }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Belarusian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BLR
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Ukranian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = UKR
							OR = {
							state = 93
								AND = {
									NOT = { is_core_of = CZE }
									NOT = { is_core_of = HUN }
									NOT = { is_core_of = POL }
									NOT = { is_core_of = ROM }
								}
							}
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}

				tooltip = RON_Controls_Latvian_States_tt
				all_state = {

#Austro Spanish Empire
Austro_Spanish_Empire_Coring_Decisions = {


#AUS
	Austro_Spanish_Empire_Core_AUS = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores Austrian States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = Form_Austro_Spain2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = AUS
							state = 39
							state = 850
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = AUS
							state = 39
							state = 850
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = AUS
							state = 39
							state = 850
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#GER
	Austro_Spanish_Empire_Core_GER = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores Austrian States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = Form_Austro_Spain2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = GER
							state = 28
							state = 912
							state = 188
							state = 85
							state = 86
							state = 807
							state = 762
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = GER
							state = 28
							state = 912
							state = 188
							state = 85
							state = 86
							state = 807
							state = 762
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = GER
							state = 28
							state = 912
							state = 188
							state = 85
							state = 86
							state = 807
							state = 762
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#SWI
	Austro_Spanish_Empire_Core_SWI = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores Austrian States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = Form_Austro_Spain2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SWI
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SWI
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = SWI
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

							is_core_of = SPR

						}
						NOT = { state = 177 }
						NOT = { state = 178 }
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

				2 = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ITA
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
				2 = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ITA
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			2 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

						is_coastal = yes
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = VEN
						is_coastal = yes
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }

						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = VEN
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

			modifier = {

					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}

						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
							state = 649
						}
					}
				}

						}

		has_global_flag = FORM_IBE2
		has_global_flag = FORM_Hispanosphere2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = BRA
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = BRA
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = BRA
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Iberian Union
	AUS_Formable_Decision10 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
			original_tag = AUS
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_IBE2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			has_global_flag = Form_Austro_Spain2
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Spanish_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SPR
							NOT = { state = 177 }
							NOT = { state = 178 }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Portuguese_States_tt
				180 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				181 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				112 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				795 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				179 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			}
			
			#Gibraltar
			118 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.10
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_IBE2
			}
		}
	}

#Canzuk
Canzuk_Coring_Decisions = {

#Whole Britain
	CANZUK_Core_Britain = {

		icon = eng_ally_imperialist_coup
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			has_global_flag = Form_CANZUK2
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ENG
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ENG
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }

						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}

						#}

				}

	FBU_CTEC = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data

		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

			}
		}

					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }

				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = FRA
						state = 29
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = FRA
						state = 29
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
						OR = {
							is_core_of =  DAH
							is_core_of =  GNA
							is_core_of =  IVO
							is_core_of =  MLI
							is_core_of =  MRT
							is_core_of =  NGR
							is_core_of =  VOL
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#French Equatorial Africa
	FBU_FRA_Core_French_Equatorial_Africa = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			original_tag = ENG
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			has_global_flag = Form_French_Union2
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						#No land connection
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
						OR = {
							is_core_of =  CAR
							is_core_of =  CHA
							is_core_of =  GAB
							is_core_of =  RCG
						}
					}
				}
		}

			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

							is_core_of =  CAR
							is_core_of =  CHA
							is_core_of =  GAB
							is_core_of =  RCG
						}
					}
				}

		}

		}

			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = PAK
						NOT = {is_core_of = BAN}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = PAK
						NOT = {is_core_of = BAN}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = PAK
						NOT = {is_core_of = BAN}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

							state = 308
							state = 692
							state = 691
							state = 687
							state = 311
							state = 299

					}
				}

							state = 693
							state = 689
							state = 308
							state = 692
							state = 691
							state = 687
							state = 311
							state = 299
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
						OR = {
							state = 696
							state = 690
							state = 693
							state = 689
							state = 308
							state = 692
							state = 691
							state = 687
							state = 311
							state = 299
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Arabian Possesions
	FBU_ENG_Core_Arabian_Possesions = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			original_tag = FRA
		}

		available = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_Anglosphere2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						#No land connection
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
						OR = {
							state = 454
							state = 455
							state = 675
							state = 765
							state = 658
							state = 659
							is_core_of = OMA
							is_core_of = YEM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 454
							state = 455
							state = 675
							state = 765
							state = 658
							state = 659
							is_core_of = OMA
							is_core_of = YEM
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
						OR = {
							state = 454
							state = 455
							state = 675
							state = 765
							state = 658
							state = 659
							is_core_of = OMA
							is_core_of = YEM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	
		#Anglosphere
	FBU_Formable_Decision89 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
			original_tag = FRA
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_Anglosphere2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			has_global_flag = FORM_FBU2
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_British_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = ENG
							NOT = { is_core_of = IRE }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Canadian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = CAN
							is_island_state = no
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Australian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = AST
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_New_Zealand_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = NZL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_American_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = USA
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}

		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.89
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_Anglosphere2
			}
		}
	}

				863 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				860 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }

			8 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }

		}

				id = RON_Formable_Country.134
			}
			hidden_effect = {

	#Franco British Union
	RON_Formable_Decision72 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_FBU2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_British_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = ENG
							NOT = { is_core_of = IRE }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_French_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = FRA
							NOT = { is_core_of = ALG }
							NOT = { state = 1 }
							NOT = { state = 735 }
							NOT = { state = 28 }
							NOT = { state = 29 }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			OR = {
				735 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				any_other_country = {
					is_in_faction_with = FROM
					controls_state = 735
				}
			}
			
			OR = {
				28 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				any_other_country = {
					is_in_faction_with = FROM
					controls_state = 28
				}
			}
			
			OR = {
				29 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				any_other_country = {
					is_in_faction_with = FROM
					controls_state = 29
				}
			}
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.72
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_FBU2
			}
		}
	}

}

#Frankish Empire
Frankish_Empire_Coring_Decisions = {

#Whole France
	FRE_Core_France = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_FRE2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = FRA
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = FRA
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = FRA
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = GER
						OR = {
							state = 42
							state = 51
							state = 50
							state = 52
							state = 53
							state = 54
							state = 55
							state = 56
							state = 57
							state = 58
							state = 59
							state = 60
							state = 909
							state = 61
							state = 62
							state = 64
							state = 65
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = GER
						OR = {
							state = 42
							state = 51
							state = 50
							state = 52
							state = 53
							state = 54
							state = 55
							state = 56
							state = 57
							state = 58
							state = 59
							state = 60
							state = 909
							state = 61
							state = 62
							state = 64
							state = 65
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

							state = 160
							state = 161
							state = 162
							state = 157
							state = 2

	#Frankish Empire
	RON_Formable_Decision6 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_FRE2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no	
			
			OR = {
				NOT = { has_government = fascism }
				NOT = { original_tag = GER }
				has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2
				#is_historical_focus_on = no
			}

			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_French_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = FRA
							NOT = { is_core_of = ALG }
							NOT = { state = 1 }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}			
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_West_German_States_tt
				42 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				51 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				56 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				57 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				59 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				58 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				909 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				54 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				55 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				50 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				52 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				53 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Austrian_States_tt
				all_state = {

			#	#Sudetenland

					}
				}
			}

				39 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				850 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				158 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				159 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				160 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				157 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				161 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				162 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }

							is_core_of = FROM

					}
				}
		}

					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		}

		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = CZE
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 69
							state = 74
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Crossing the English Channel as Non Britain
	Germanic_Union_CTEC = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow One Time
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			NOT = {
				original_tag = ENG
				original_tag = WLS
				original_tag = IRE
				original_tag = SCO
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_Germanic_Union2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			
			29 = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ENG
						state = 127
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ENG
						state = 127
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = ENG
						state = 127
					}

					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SWE
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SWE
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = SWE
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
