#Actual Formable
	#Germanic Union
	RON_Formable_Decision109 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_Germanic_Union2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no		

			OR = {
				NOT = { has_government = fascism }
				NOT = { original_tag = GER }
				has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2
				#is_historical_focus_on = no
			}			
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_German_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = GER
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Austrian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = AUS
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Swiss_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SWI
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Belgian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BEL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Dutch_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = HOL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			#Luxembourg
			8 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Danish_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = DEN
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Norwegian_States_tt
				110 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				142 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				143 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				144 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				920 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				921 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				922 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				923 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				924 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				925 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Swedish_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SWE
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_British_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = ENG
							NOT = { is_core_of = IRE }
							NOT = { is_core_of = CAN }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.109
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_Germanic_Union2
			}
		}
	}

}

#JOR
	Greater_Israel_Core_JOR = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = JOR
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = JOR
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }

					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}

		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = LAO
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = LAO
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = LAO
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Indochina
	RON_Formable_Decision42 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_ICH2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Vietnamese_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = VIN
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Laos_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = LAO
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Cambodian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = CAM
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.42
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_ICH2
			}
		}
	}

}

#Intermarium
Intermarium_Coring_Decisions = {

Intermarium_Core_LIT = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_Intermarium2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = LIT
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = LIT
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = LIT
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

		has_global_flag = FORM_POH2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = HUN
							is_core_of = TRA
							state = 45
							state = 109
							state = 103
							state = 664
							state = 70
							state = 71
							state = 73
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = HUN
							is_core_of = TRA
							state = 45
							state = 109
							state = 103
							state = 664
							state = 70
							state = 71
							state = 73
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = HUN
							is_core_of = TRA
							state = 45
							state = 109
							state = 103
							state = 664
							state = 70
							state = 71
							state = 73
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
			OR = {
				original_tag = POL

			}

		}

			#is_subject = no
			
			OR = {
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Modern_Polish_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = POL
							NOT = { is_core_of = BLR }
							NOT = { is_core_of = UKR }
							NOT = { is_core_of = LIT }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
				#Polish Germany
				5 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				63 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				66 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				67 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				68 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Polish_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = POL
							
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Hungarian_States_tt
				154 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				155 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				43 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			}
			
			76 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			45 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			664 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			73 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			
			
		}

			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.26

#Latin Union
Latin_Union_Coring_Decisions = {

#Gibraltar
	Latin_Union_Core_Gibraltar = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data

		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_LAU2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			118 = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_controlled_by = FROM
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			118 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			118 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}

#Whole Portugal

							state = 697
							state = 698
							any_neighbor_state = {
								is_core_of = FROM
							}
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100

						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = POR
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = POR
						OR = {
							state = 697
							state = 698
							any_neighbor_state = {
								is_core_of = FROM
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data

		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_LAU2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			686 = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_controlled_by = FROM
						#any_neighbor_state = {
							#is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			686 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			686 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Whole Colombia
	Latin_Union_Core_Colombia = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_LAU2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = COL
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = COL
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = COL
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	Latin_Union_Start_Core_Venezuela = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Only One Time as its Initial Landing
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_LAU2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = VEN
						is_coastal = yes
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = VEN
						is_coastal = yes
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = VEN
						is_coastal = yes
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress

	#Whole Ecuador
	Latin_Union_Core_Ecuador = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_LAU2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ECU
						OR = {
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
							state = 649
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ECU
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = ECU
						OR = {
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
							state = 649
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

		fire_only_once = yes

			366 = {

						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }

						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			366 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			366 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#New Spain
	Latin_Union_Core_New_Spain = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14

					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = USA

							state = 375
							state = 376
							state = 377
							state = 378
							state = 379
							state = 380
							state = 382

							state = 380
							state = 382

					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}

#Latin Union
	RON_Formable_Decision3 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_LAU2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Spanish_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SPR
							NOT = { state = 177 }
							NOT = { state = 178 }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Portuguese_States_tt
				180 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				181 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				112 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				795 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				179 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_French_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = FRA
							NOT = { is_core_of = ALG }
							NOT = { state = 1 }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Italian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = ITA
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Romanian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = ROM
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.3
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_LAU2
			}
		}
	}

}

				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = ISR
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Macedonian Empire
	RON_Formable_Decision29 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_MAC2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Greek_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = GRE
							NOT = { state = 164 }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Bulgarian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BUL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Macedonian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = MAC
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Turkish_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = TUR
							NOT = {
								is_core_of = SYR
								state = 341
								state = 797
								state = 799
							}
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}

		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.29
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_MAC2
			}
		}
	}

}

						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = PER
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = PER
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = UZB
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = UZB
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Mongol Empire
	RON_Formable_Decision33 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_MOE2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Mongolian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = MON
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Inner_Mongolian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = MEN
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Sinkiang_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SIK
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.33
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_MOE2
			}
		}
	}

}

#North Sea Empire
North_Sea_Empire_Coring_Decisions = {

#Start Integration of NOR
	NSE_Start_NOR = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow One Time
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
		}

		available = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_NSE2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			
			130 = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = NOR
						state = 110
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = NOR
						state = 110
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = NOR
						state = 110
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = LIT
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = LIT
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

							state = 5

							state = 67

						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 5
							state = 63
							state = 66
							state = 67
							state = 68
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}

							state = 5
							state = 63

#Slavic Union
	SLA_Formable_Decision127 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = Form_Slavic_Union2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Russian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SOV
							NOT = { is_core_of = BLR }
							NOT = { is_core_of = UKR }
							NOT = { is_core_of = TAN }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Belarusian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BLR
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Ukranian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = UKR
							NOT = { is_core_of = ROM }
							NOT = { is_core_of = CZE }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Polish_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = POL
							NOT = { is_core_of = BLR }
							NOT = { is_core_of = UKR }
							NOT = { is_core_of = LIT }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Czechoslovak_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = CZE
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Bulgarian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BUL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Yugoslav_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = YUG
							NOT = {
								state = 163
								state = 852
								state = 736
							}
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.127
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = Form_Slavic_Union2
			}
		}
	}
	
}

#Transcaucasia
Transcaucasia_Coring_Decisions = {

Transcaucasia_Core_GEO = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 20
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 5 }
		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_CAU2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = GEO
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = GEO
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = GEO
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	RON_Formable_Decision41 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_TKS2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_KAZ_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = KAZ
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Turkish_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = TUR
							NOT = {
								is_core_of = SYR
								state = 341
								state = 797
								state = 799
							}
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_AZR_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = AZR
							NOT = {
								is_core_of = PER
							}
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_TMS_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = TMS
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_UZB_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = UZB
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_KYR_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = KYR
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			

		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.41
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_TKS2
			}
		}

#The Americas
MUN_AME_Coring_Decisions = {

MUN_AME_Core_USA = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		OR = { 
			has_global_flag = FORM_NOA2
			has_global_flag = FORM_The_Americas2 
		}
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = USA
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = USA
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = CAN
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

#Whole Canada
	MUN_AME_Core_Canada = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		OR = { 
			has_global_flag = FORM_NOA2
			has_global_flag = FORM_The_Americas2 
		}
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CAN
						OR = {
							any_neighbor_state = {
								is_core_of = FROM
							}
							state = 331
							state = 739
							state = 740
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CAN
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = CAN
						OR = {
							any_neighbor_state = {
								is_core_of = FROM
							}
							state = 331
							state = 739
							state = 740
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Whole Paraguay
	MUN_AME_Core_Paraguay = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			OR = { 
				has_global_flag = FORM_SOU2
				has_global_flag = FORM_The_Americas2 
				has_global_flag = FORM_Patria_Grande2
			}
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = PAR
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = PAR
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = PAR
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Canadian American Union
	CAN_Formable_Decision106 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_Canadian_American_Union2 }
			original_tag = CAN
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_American_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = USA
							is_on_continent = north_america
							is_island_state = no
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Canadian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = CAN
							is_on_continent = north_america
							is_island_state = no
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}

		}
		icon = generic_form_nation

			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.106
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_Canadian_American_Union2
			}
		}

#European Union
MUN_EUR_Coring_Decisions = {

#Whole Spain
	MUN_EUR_Core_Spain = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_EUR2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = SPR
							state = 118
						}
						NOT = { state = 177 }
						NOT = { state = 178 }
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = SPR
							state = 118
						}
						NOT = { state = 177 }
						NOT = { state = 178 }
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = SPR
							state = 118
						}
						NOT = { state = 177 }
						NOT = { state = 178 }
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			NOT = {
				original_tag = ENG
				original_tag = WLS
				original_tag = IRE
				original_tag = SCO
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_EUR2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			
			29 = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ENG
						state = 127
					}
				}
		}

			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}

						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ENG
						state = 127
					}
				}

						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Crossing the North Sea as Non Denmark
	MUN_EUR_CTNS = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow One Time
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			OR = {
				original_tag = NOR
				original_tag = SWE
				original_tag = FIN
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_EUR2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			
			OR = {
				110 = { is_core_of = ROOT }
				921 = { is_core_of = ROOT }
				922 = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			}	
			
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = DEN
						state = 99
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = DEN
						state = 99
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = DEN
						state = 99
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

#Crossing the North Sea as Denmark
	MUN_EUR_CTNS2 = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow One Time
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			NOT = {
				original_tag = NOR
				original_tag = SWE
				original_tag = FIN
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_EUR2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			99 = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = NOR
						OR = {
							state = 110
							state = 921
							state = 922
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = NOR
						OR = {
							state = 110
							state = 921
							state = 922
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = NOR
						OR = {
							state = 110
							state = 921
							state = 922
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = BUL
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	MUN_EUR_Core_ICE = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data

		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_EUR2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14	
			100 = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_controlled_by = FROM
						#Not Needed Because Its an Island
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			100 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			100 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Greenland
	MUN_EUR_Core_GRL = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data

		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_EUR2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14	
			101 = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_controlled_by = FROM
						#Not Needed Because Its an Island
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			101 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			101 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Start Coring CAN
	MUN_EUR_Start_Core_CAN = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_country_flag = RON_European_Brothers
		has_global_flag = FORM_EUR2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CAN
						is_coastal = yes
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CAN
						is_coastal = yes
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = CAN
						is_coastal = yes
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Whole CAN
	MUN_EUR_Core_CAN = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_country_flag = RON_European_Brothers
		has_global_flag = FORM_EUR2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CAN
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CAN
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = CAN
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Start Coring USA

					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }

						is_coastal = yes
					}
				}

			factor = 100

	#Southern Brazil
	MUN_EUR_Core_BRA = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
		
		}

		available = {
		has_country_flag = RON_European_Brothers
		has_global_flag = FORM_EUR2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 501
							state = 502
							state = 503
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 501
							state = 502
							state = 503
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							state = 501
							state = 502
							state = 503
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Start Coring AST
	MUN_EUR_Start_Core_AST = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_country_flag = RON_European_Brothers
		has_global_flag = FORM_EUR2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = AST
						is_coastal = yes
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = AST
						is_coastal = yes
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = AST
						is_coastal = yes
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Whole AST
	MUN_EUR_Core_AST = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_country_flag = RON_European_Brothers
		has_global_flag = FORM_EUR2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = AST
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = AST
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = AST
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Our European Brothers
	MUN_Formable_Decision1019 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 60
		days_re_enable = 0
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RON_European_Brothers }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			has_global_flag = FORM_EUR2
			
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_European_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_on_continent = europe
							is_island_state = no
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Canadian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = CAN
							is_island_state = no
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_American_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = USA
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Australian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = AST
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_New_Zealand_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = NZL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}

		}
		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		remove_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.1019
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_country_flag = RON_European_Brothers
			}
		}
	}

#European Union
	MUN_Formable_Decision4 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_EUR2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			OR = {
				NOT = { has_government = fascism }
				NOT = { original_tag = GER }
				has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2
				#is_historical_focus_on = no
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_French_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = FRA
							NOT = { is_core_of = ALG }
							NOT = { state = 1 }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Italian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = ITA
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Dutch_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = HOL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Belgian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BEL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			#Luxembourg
			8 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_West_German_States_tt
				42 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				51 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				56 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				57 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				59 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				58 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				909 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				54 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				55 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				50 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				52 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
				53 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }
			}
			
			
			

		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.4
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_EUR2
			}
		}
	}

}
#Asian Union
MUN_ASI_Coring_Decisions = {

#Whole Japan
	MUN_ASI_Core_Japan = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_ASI2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = JAP
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = JAP
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = JAP
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	MUN_ASI_Core_Phillippines = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_ASI2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = PHI
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = PHI
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = PHI
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Whole Indonesia
	MUN_ASI_Core_Indonesia = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_ASI2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = INS
							state = 721
							state = 523
							state = 737
							state = 634
						}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = INS
							state = 721
							state = 523
							state = 737
							state = 634
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = INS
							state = 721
							state = 523
							state = 737
							state = 634
						}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Whole Indochina
	MUN_ASI_Core_Indochina = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_ASI2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = VIN
							is_core_of = LAO
							is_core_of = CAM
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = VIN
							is_core_of = LAO
							is_core_of = CAM
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = VIN
							is_core_of = LAO
							is_core_of = CAM
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Whole Russia
	MUN_ASI_Core_SOV = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_ASI2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14	
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SOV
						NOT = {
							is_core_of = UKR
							is_core_of = BLR
							is_core_of = LIT
							is_core_of = LAT
							is_core_of = EST
							is_core_of = GEO
							is_core_of = ARM
							is_core_of = AZR
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						NOT = {
							state = 351
							state = 262
							state = 581
							state = 573
							state = 582
							state = 999
							state = 406
							state = 236
							state = 407
							state = 401
							state = 239
							state = 400
							state = 398
							state = 252
							state = 255
							state = 256
							state = 397
							state = 399
							state = 249
							state = 651
							state = 652
							state = 250
							state = 251
							state = 825
							state = 880
							state = 829
							state = 833
							is_on_continent = europe
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SOV
						NOT = {
							is_core_of = UKR
							is_core_of = BLR
							is_core_of = LIT
							is_core_of = LAT
							is_core_of = EST
							is_core_of = GEO
							is_core_of = ARM
							is_core_of = AZR
						}
						NOT = {
							state = 351
							state = 262
							state = 581
							state = 573
							state = 582
							state = 999
							state = 406
							state = 236
							state = 407
							state = 401
							state = 239
							state = 400
							state = 398
							state = 252
							state = 255
							state = 256
							state = 397
							state = 399
							state = 249
							state = 651
							state = 652
							state = 250
							state = 251
							state = 825
							state = 880
							state = 829
							state = 833
							is_on_continent = europe
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SOV
						NOT = {
							is_core_of = UKR
							is_core_of = BLR
							is_core_of = LIT
							is_core_of = LAT
							is_core_of = EST
							is_core_of = GEO
							is_core_of = ARM
							is_core_of = AZR
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						NOT = {
							state = 351
							state = 262
							state = 581
							state = 573
							state = 582
							state = 999
							state = 406
							state = 236
							state = 407
							state = 401
							state = 239
							state = 400
							state = 398
							state = 252
							state = 255
							state = 256
							state = 397
							state = 399
							state = 249
							state = 651
							state = 652
							state = 250
							state = 251
							state = 825
							state = 880
							state = 829
							state = 833
							is_on_continent = europe
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

#Asian Union
	MUN_Formable_Decision66 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_ASI2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Bangladesh_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BAN
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Cambodian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = CAM
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			#Chinese
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Chinese_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = CHI
							NOT = { state = 728 }
							NOT = { state = 729 }
							NOT = { state = 326 }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Indian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = RAJ
							NOT = {
								state = 320
								state = 321
							}
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Japanese_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = JAP
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_South_Korean_States_tt
				525 = {
					is_controlled_by = FROM
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Laos_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = LAO
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Malaya_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = MAL
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Burmese_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BRM
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Pakistani_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = PAK
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_PHI_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = PHI
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Siamese_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SIA
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Vietnamese_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = VIN
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.66
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_ASI2
			}
		}
	}

}
#African Union
MUN_AFR_Coring_Decisions = {

MUN_AFR_Core_North_Africa = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_AFR2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = ALG
							is_core_of = EGY
							is_core_of = LBA
							is_core_of = MOR
							is_core_of = SUD
							is_core_of = TUN
							is_core_of = WES
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = ALG
							is_core_of = EGY
							is_core_of = LBA
							is_core_of = MOR
							is_core_of = SUD
							is_core_of = TUN
							is_core_of = WES
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = ALG
							is_core_of = EGY
							is_core_of = LBA
							is_core_of = MOR
							is_core_of = SUD
							is_core_of = TUN
							is_core_of = WES
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

#Eurasian Union
Eurasian_Union_Coring_Decisions = {


#Whole Spain
	Eurasia_Core_Spain = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_EUA2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = SPR
							state = 118
						}
						NOT = { state = 177 }
						NOT = { state = 178 }
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = SPR
							state = 118
						}
						NOT = { state = 177 }
						NOT = { state = 178 }
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = SPR
							state = 118
						}
						NOT = { state = 177 }
						NOT = { state = 178 }
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Whole Portugal
	Eurasia_Core_Portugal = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_EUA2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = POR
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = POR
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = POR
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}

				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = DEN
						state = 99
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = DEN
						state = 99
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

#Crossing the North Sea as Denmark
	Eurasia_CTNS2 = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow One Time
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			NOT = {
				original_tag = NOR
				original_tag = SWE
				original_tag = FIN
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_EUA2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			99 = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = NOR
						OR = {
							state = 110
							state = 921
							state = 922
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = NOR
						OR = {
							state = 110
							state = 921
							state = 922
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = NOR
						OR = {
							state = 110
							state = 921
							state = 922
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = YUG
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = YUG
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	Eurasia_Core_SOV = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_EUA2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14	
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SOV
						NOT = {
							is_core_of = UKR
							is_core_of = BLR
							is_core_of = LIT
							is_core_of = LAT
							is_core_of = EST
							is_core_of = GEO
							is_core_of = ARM
							is_core_of = AZR
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 351
							state = 262
							state = 581
							state = 573
							state = 582
							state = 999
							state = 406
							state = 236
							state = 407
							state = 401
							state = 239
							state = 400
							state = 398
							state = 252

							state = 256

							state = 399

							state = 251
							state = 825
							state = 880
							state = 829
							state = 833
							is_on_continent = europe
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {

					AND = {

							is_core_of = LAT
							is_core_of = EST
							is_core_of = GEO
							is_core_of = ARM
							is_core_of = AZR
						}
						OR = {
							state = 351
							state = 262
							state = 581
							state = 573
							state = 582
							state = 999
							state = 406
							state = 236
							state = 407
							state = 401
							state = 239
							state = 400
							state = 398
							state = 252
							state = 255
							state = 256
							state = 397
							state = 399
							state = 249
							state = 651
							state = 652
							state = 250
							state = 251
							state = 825
							state = 880
							state = 829
							state = 833
							is_on_continent = europe
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {

						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }

		fire_only_once = yes

						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			100 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			100 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_EUA2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14	
			101 = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_controlled_by = FROM
						#Not Needed Because Its an Island
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			101 = { NOT = { is_core_of = FROM } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			101 = {
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	
#Whole Japan

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		has_global_flag = FORM_EUA2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14

					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = JAP
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}

						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = JAP
					}
				}

		}

						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}

						#}

				}
