	#Whole Pacific Islands
	Eurasia_Core_Pacific_Islands = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_EUA2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 648
							state = 647
							state = 684
							state = 633
							#Non Starting Japanese
							state = 629
							state = 630
							state = 631
							state = 632
							state = 727
							state = 642
							state = 638
							state = 725
							state = 639
							state = 643
							state = 726
							state = 636
							state = 734
							state = 635
							state = 641
							state = 875
							state = 650
						}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 648
							state = 647
							state = 684
							state = 633
							#Non Starting Japanese
							state = 629
							state = 630
							state = 631
							state = 632
							state = 727
							state = 642
							state = 638
							state = 725
							state = 639
							state = 643
							state = 726
							state = 636
							state = 734
							state = 635
							state = 641
							state = 875
							state = 650
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							state = 648
							state = 647
							state = 684
							state = 633
							#Non Starting Japanese
							state = 629
							state = 630
							state = 631
							state = 632
							state = 727
							state = 642
							state = 638
							state = 725
							state = 639
							state = 643
							state = 726
							state = 636
							state = 734
							state = 635
							state = 641
							state = 875
							state = 650
						}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress

		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14

					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SIA
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}

					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SIA
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = SIA
						any_neighbor_state = {

#Whole Saudi_Arabia
	Eurasia_Core_Saudi_Arabia = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_EUA2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = SAU
							is_core_of = OMA
							is_core_of = YEM
							is_core_of = UAE
							is_core_of = QAT
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = SAU
							is_core_of = OMA
							is_core_of = YEM
							is_core_of = UAE
							is_core_of = QAT
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = SAU
							is_core_of = OMA
							is_core_of = YEM
							is_core_of = UAE
							is_core_of = QAT

						}
					}
				}

RON_Formable_Decision67 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_EUA2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			OR = {
				NOT = { has_government = fascism }
				NOT = { original_tag = GER }
				has_global_flag = FORM_GGR2
				#is_historical_focus_on = no
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_French_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = FRA
							NOT = { is_core_of = ALG }
							NOT = { state = 1 }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Italian_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = ITA
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Dutch_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = HOL
						}

					}
				}
			}

			}

				42 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }

				56 = { is_controlled_by = FROM }

			}

				tooltip = RON_Controls_Chinese_States_tt

							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = MEX
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = MEX
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Central America
	MUN_WOR_Core_Central_America = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_WOR2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = GUA
							is_core_of = ELS
							is_core_of = HON
							is_core_of = COS
							is_core_of = NIC
							is_core_of = PAN
							is_core_of = BLZ
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

				factor = 0

					is_major = no
				}

							is_core_of = COS
							is_core_of = NIC
							is_core_of = PAN
							is_core_of = BLZ
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }

	MUN_WOR_Core_Argentina = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		
		has_global_flag = FORM_WOR2
		
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ARG
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ARG
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = ARG
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	
MUN_WOR_Core_North_Africa = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_WOR2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = ALG
							is_core_of = EGY
							is_core_of = LBA
							is_core_of = MOR
							is_core_of = SUD
							is_core_of = TUN
							is_core_of = WES
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = ALG
							is_core_of = EGY
							is_core_of = LBA
							is_core_of = MOR
							is_core_of = SUD
							is_core_of = TUN
							is_core_of = WES
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = ALG
							is_core_of = EGY
							is_core_of = LBA
							is_core_of = MOR
							is_core_of = SUD
							is_core_of = TUN
							is_core_of = WES
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	MUN_WOR_Core_East_Africa = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_WOR2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = BRD
							is_core_of = DJI
							is_core_of = ERI
							is_core_of = ETH
							is_core_of = KEN
							is_core_of = MAD
							is_core_of = MLW
							is_core_of = MZB
							is_core_of = RWA
							is_core_of = SOM
							is_core_of = TZN
							is_core_of = UGA
							is_core_of = ZAM
							is_core_of = ZIM
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = BRD
							is_core_of = DJI
							is_core_of = ERI
							is_core_of = ETH
							is_core_of = KEN
							is_core_of = MAD
							is_core_of = MLW
							is_core_of = MZB
							is_core_of = RWA
							is_core_of = SOM
							is_core_of = TZN
							is_core_of = UGA
							is_core_of = ZAM
							is_core_of = ZIM
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = BRD
							is_core_of = DJI
							is_core_of = ERI
							is_core_of = ETH
							is_core_of = KEN
							is_core_of = MAD
							is_core_of = MLW
							is_core_of = MZB
							is_core_of = RWA
							is_core_of = SOM
							is_core_of = TZN
							is_core_of = UGA
							is_core_of = ZAM
							is_core_of = ZIM
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

		fire_only_once = no

		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_WOR2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = ANG
							is_core_of = CMR
							is_core_of = CAR
							is_core_of = CHA
							is_core_of = COG

							is_core_of = EQG
							is_core_of = GAB
						}

					}

					}

		}

							is_core_of = FROM

#Whole Spain
	MUN_WOR_Core_Spain = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_WOR2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = SPR
							state = 118
						}
						NOT = { state = 177 }
						NOT = { state = 178 }
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							is_core_of = SPR
							state = 118
						}
						NOT = { state = 177 }
						NOT = { state = 178 }
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = SPR
							state = 118
						}
						NOT = { state = 177 }
						NOT = { state = 178 }
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Crossing the English Channel as Non Britain
	MUN_WOR_CTEC = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow One Time
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			NOT = {
				original_tag = ENG
				original_tag = WLS
				original_tag = IRE
				original_tag = SCO
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_WOR2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			
			29 = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ENG
						state = 127
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ENG
						state = 127
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = ENG
						state = 127
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

#Crossing the English Channel as Britain
	MUN_WOR_CTEC2 = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow One Time
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			OR = {
				original_tag = ENG
				original_tag = WLS
				original_tag = IRE
				original_tag = SCO
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_WOR2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			127 = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = FRA
						state = 29
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = FRA
						state = 29
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = FRA
						state = 29
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Whole Britain

		fire_only_once = no

					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ENG
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ENG
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = ENG
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM

			}	
			
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = DEN
						state = 99
					}
				}
		}

			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0

					is_major = no
				}

						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SWE
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = SWE
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = UKR
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	#Whole Russia
	MUN_WOR_Core_SOV = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_WOR2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14	
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SOV
						NOT = {
							is_core_of = UKR
							is_core_of = BLR
							is_core_of = LIT
							is_core_of = LAT
							is_core_of = EST
							is_core_of = GEO
							is_core_of = ARM
							is_core_of = AZR
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 351
							state = 262
							state = 581
							state = 573
							state = 582
							state = 999
							state = 406
							state = 236
							state = 407
							state = 401
							state = 239
							state = 400
							state = 398
							state = 252
							state = 255
							state = 256
							state = 397
							state = 399
							state = 249
							state = 651
							state = 652
							state = 250
							state = 251
							state = 825
							state = 880
							state = 829
							state = 833
							is_on_continent = europe
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SOV
						NOT = {
							is_core_of = UKR
							is_core_of = BLR
							is_core_of = LIT
							is_core_of = LAT
							is_core_of = EST
							is_core_of = GEO
							is_core_of = ARM
							is_core_of = AZR
						}
						OR = {
							state = 351
							state = 262
							state = 581
							state = 573
							state = 582
							state = 999
							state = 406
							state = 236
							state = 407
							state = 401
							state = 239
							state = 400
							state = 398
							state = 252
							state = 255
							state = 256
							state = 397
							state = 399
							state = 249
							state = 651
							state = 652
							state = 250
							state = 251
							state = 825
							state = 880
							state = 829
							state = 833
							is_on_continent = europe
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SOV
						NOT = {
							is_core_of = UKR
							is_core_of = BLR
							is_core_of = LIT
							is_core_of = LAT
							is_core_of = EST
							is_core_of = GEO
							is_core_of = ARM
							is_core_of = AZR
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							state = 351
							state = 262
							state = 581
							state = 573
							state = 582
							state = 999
							state = 406
							state = 236
							state = 407
							state = 401
							state = 239
							state = 400
							state = 398
							state = 252

							state = 638
							state = 725
							state = 639
							state = 643
							state = 726
							state = 636
							state = 734
							state = 635
							state = 641
							state = 875
							state = 650
						}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						OR = {
							state = 648
							state = 647
							state = 684
							state = 633
							#Non Starting Japanese
							state = 629
							state = 630
							state = 631
							state = 632
							state = 727
							state = 642
							state = 638
							state = 725
							state = 639
							state = 643
							state = 726
							state = 636
							state = 734
							state = 635
							state = 641
							state = 875
							state = 650
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						OR = {
							state = 648
							state = 647
							state = 684
							state = 633
							#Non Starting Japanese
							state = 629
							state = 630
							state = 631
							state = 632
							state = 727
							state = 642
							state = 638
							state = 725
							state = 639
							state = 643
							state = 726
							state = 636
							state = 734
							state = 635
							state = 641
							state = 875
							state = 650
						}
						#any_neighbor_state = {
						#	is_core_of = FROM
						#}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}
	
	
	#Whole Chinese_Interior
	MUN_WOR_Core_Chinese_Interior = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_WOR2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CHI
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = CHI
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = CHI
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	MUN_WOR_Core_Bangladesh = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
		has_global_flag = FORM_WOR2
		num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = BAN
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
			any_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = BAN
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = BAN
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

	#Whole Russia
	MUN_WOR_Core_SOV2 = {

		icon = hol_exchange_intelligence_data
		
		#Allow Multiple Times as it cores States one by one
		fire_only_once = no
		cost = 60
		modifier = { civilian_factory_use = 15 }
		days_remove = 21

		allowed = {
			
		}

		available = {
			has_global_flag = FORM_WOR2
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14	
			any_controlled_state = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = SOV
						NOT = {
							is_core_of = UKR
							is_core_of = BLR
							is_core_of = LIT
							is_core_of = LAT
							is_core_of = EST
							is_core_of = GEO
							is_core_of = ARM
							is_core_of = AZR
						}
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
						NOT = {
							state = 351
							state = 262
							state = 581
							state = 573
							state = 582
							state = 999
							state = 406
							state = 236
							state = 407
							state = 401
							state = 239
							state = 400
							state = 398
							state = 252
							state = 255
							state = 256

							state = 399

							state = 250
							state = 251
							state = 825
							state = 880
							state = 829
							state = 833
							is_on_continent = europe
						}
					}
				}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {

							is_core_of = GEO

							is_core_of = AZR
						}
						NOT = {
							state = 351
							state = 262
							state = 581
							state = 573
							state = 582
							state = 999
							state = 406
							state = 236
							state = 407
							state = 401
							state = 239
							state = 400
							state = 398
							state = 252
							state = 255
							state = 256
							state = 397
							state = 399
							state = 249
							state = 651
							state = 652
							state = 250
							state = 251
							state = 825
							state = 880
							state = 829
							state = 833
							is_on_continent = europe
						}
					}
				}

		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {

			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }
			random_controlled_state = {
				limit = {		
					AND = {
						NOT = {is_core_of = FROM}
						is_core_of = LEB
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			clr_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
		}
	}

						is_core_of = ISR

							is_core_of = FROM
						}
					}
				}
		}

			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress
					is_major = no
				}
			}

					AND = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = FROM }
						is_core_of = ISR
					}
				}

		}

			set_country_flag = Coring_In_Progress

			if = { limit = { is_ai = no } hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus } }

							state = 669
						}
					}
				}

		}

	#United Nations
	RON_Formable_Decision31 = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
		cost = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		allowed = {
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = FORM_WOR2 }
		}
		available = {
			#is_subject = no
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Chinese_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = CHI
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_French_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = FRA
							NOT = { is_core_of = ALG }
							NOT = { state = 1 }
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}

							is_core_of = URG
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = RON_Controls_Venezuelan_States_tt
				all_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = VEN
						}
						is_controlled_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			
		}
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = RON_Formable_Country.31
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = FORM_WOR2
			}
		}
	}
	

}
